projects.title: Recipe App
projects.description: FullStack web application that seamlessly integrates a user-friendly interface with the robust capabilities of the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js). This application empowers users to effortlessly create, delete, and save their favorite food recipes, all while enjoying the convenience of user registration and authentication using JSON Web Tokens (JWT).

projects.title: Marvel characters
projects.description: Marvel Character Information Website: Dive into the Marvel universe with our interactive web application! I designed and developed this feature-rich platform that allows users to explore detailed information about their favorite Marvel characters. With a sleek and user-friendly interface, users can easily search for characters, access their names, descriptions, and discover the series in which they have appeared

projects.title: Pokemon Searcher (Pokedex)
projects.description: The app fetches data from the Pokémon API and dynamically presents Pokémon information, including their names, types, abilities, and base stats. Each Pokémon entry is accompanied by an image representing the Pokémon.Users can search for specific Pokémon by their names. The app provides a search bar where users can enter a Pokémon's name.
